translated: The French motorway A43 (also called Alpine highway and the Maurienne motorway) is a motorway linking Lyon to Modane which provides access to the Fréjus tunnel.
original: L'autoroute française A43 (aussi appelée autoroute alpine et autoroute de la Maurienne) est une autoroute reliant Lyon à Modane qui permet de rejoindre le tunnel du Fréjus.
